name: NonZero - The Descent
description:
It’s been over a decade since “Helix” left the Earth in hopes of reaching a new exoplanet. But what about people back on Earth? Do they even realise what terrible fate awaits them and what secrets the “Company” holds?

This is a sequel to my original NonZero game which took place in a spaceship travelling to a new planet. It’s been a while since “Helix” departure and a lot has changed back on Earth. You wake up in the facility called “TERA”. Alone, confused and it seems there’s no one around.

Find your way out and figure out what is going on, but be careful… there might be bloodthirsty creatures lurking in the shadows...
